ec1e269e-470d-43d9-8f23-8a19a5c96fcc.Statement: Anaemia was the most common adverse event in cohort 1 of the primary trial and tachycardia was the most common in cohort 2
ec1e269e-470d-43d9-8f23-8a19a5c96fcc.Label: Contradiction

b1dd7632-ed92-40a9-9293-bce68619c658.Statement: Patients with stage 4 cancer are excluded from the primary trial, only patients with stage 2 and 3 cancer can be eligible
b1dd7632-ed92-40a9-9293-bce68619c658.Label: Contradiction
